mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO trail(title, description, total_length, estimated_time, start_name, start_sido_code, start_gugun_code, start_detail_addr, end_name, end_sido_code, end_gugun_code, end_detail_addr, route, tel, manage_name, add_date, provide_code, provide_name) VALUES
(#{dto.title},#{dto.description},#{dto.total_length},#{dto.estimated_time},#{dto.start_name},#{dto.start_sido_code}, #{dto.start_gugun_code},#{dto.start_detail_addr},#{dto.end_name},#{dto.end_sido_code},#{dto.end_gugun_code}, #{dto.end_detail_addr},#{dto.route},#{dto.tel},#{dto.manage_name},#{dto.add_date},#{dto.provide_code}, #{dto.provide_name})
